articles.author: Katie Kindelan
articles.title: Kate Middleton makes 1st public appearance since cancer diagnosis - Good Morning America
articles.description: Kate revealed in March that she had been diagnosed with cancer.
articles.content:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, made her first public appearance Saturday since announcing in March that she had been diagnosed with cancer.
Kate joined her husband Prince William, their three children… [+3735 chars]
